attributes.action: demand that the makers of "X Factor" sack Louis Walsh.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to demand the Prime Ministers intervention to order FremantleMedia to remove Louis Walsh from the ITV Show X Factor. He's very slimey, knowns nothing about music and is causing considerable embarrassment to the entire Irish nation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
